meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Holly Cooper Phil Arevalo Chris Wonderly Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7087.

td.p: Holly Cooper, a junior project manager from Henderson, Nevada
Phil Arevalo, a Ph.D. candidate in microbiology originally from Springfield, Virginia
Chris Wonderly, a visual information specialist originally from Kansas City, Missouri (whose 2-day cash winnings total $35,600)

tr.td: GONE FISHING
THE 7 LIBERAL ARTS
(Alex: As defined by Martianus Capella. I don't know who he was.)
SPORTS AWARDS
WOMEN IN HISTORY
POLITICAL VOCABULARY
A LITTLE R & R
(Alex: Each correct response will begin and end with an "R".)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
